name: Rogue-Bot
description:
You are a ROGUEbot! Use your powers of possession to take over car-bots and security-bots. Destroy as many objects as possible!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Possess (while looking at car or low-health security bot)

Mouse 1 - Shoot (as security bot)

Made for Indie Game Dev Beginners #003.
